name: Zaccaria Pinball
detailed_description:
Zaccaria Pinball celebrates the rich legacy of Zaccaria, the Italian pioneers of pinball. As the 3rd largest pinball manufacturer in the world during their golden years (1974–1987), the Zaccaria brothers (Marino, Franco, and Natale) crafted over 35 iconic machines that captivated arcade enthusiasts worldwide. Faithful recreations of over 35 Zaccaria tables, designed to preserve their timeless appeal. Enhanced visuals with modern lighting, shadows, and graphical upgrades.

Play Zaccaria Pinball and experience the thrill of classic pinball completely free!

Jump straight into the Time Machine table at no cost. Love the style? Unlock its Retro version simply by joining the Zaccaria Pinball Community Page!

Want more? With over 140+ constantly expanding pinball tables, you can try them all unlimited time in trial mode, with a score limit.

Ready for the ultimate challenge? Story Mode takes you on a journey through 42 uniquely designed pinball tables, each presenting unique challenges. Climb the leaderboard and unlock at least 45 achievements as you master the Story Mode.

And for the complete retro experience, dive into 6 video games that will transport you back in time!

VR Support – Immerse yourself in pinball like never before with full VR support. (Zaccaria Pinball - VR DLC required.)

Local Multiplayer – Hotseat up to 4 players in Classic game mode.

Multiplayer Mode – Challenge your friends online, just like in the golden age of arcade halls.

Free to Play Content – Enjoy the Time Machine table completely free! Try all other tables in trial mode with score limits.

Authentic Pinball Experience – Play highly detailed Zaccaria pinball tables with original rules, sounds, and voiceovers.

Stunning Visuals – Immerse yourself in breathtaking lighting, dynamic shadows, realistic reflections, and mesmerizing glow effects.

Realistic & Customizable Physics – Fine-tuned physics engine with accurate ball movement, flipper action, and table behavior.

Multiple Physics Modes – Choose from Arcade, Simulation, and Custom Mode to suit your playstyle.

Multiple Game Modes – Choose from seven unique game modes to test your skills.

Camera Editor – Customize your view with 4 custom camera angles or pick from 3 standard presets.

Global Leaderboards – Compete with players worldwide! Every game, game mode and physics mode has its own dedicated leaderboard, so you can prove your skills in any category.

Discover a pinball experience for every era and style!

Zaccaria Tables – Authentic recreations of classic Zaccaria pinball tables, featuring original rules, sounds, and voiceovers straight from the golden age of pinball. These tables can be purchased separately as DLC.

Retro Tables – A nostalgic journey back to the 1950s, featuring simplified designs and a charming vintage aesthetic. Retro tables can be unlocked by purchasing Solid-State or Electro-Mechanical pinball tables with the same name or purchasing the Zaccaria Pinball - 40 Retro Tables DLC.

Remake Tables – Classic Zaccaria tables, reimagined with a 90s twist! Enjoy bold visuals, enhanced gameplay, and a fresh take on timeless designs. These tables can be purchased separately as DLC.

Deluxe Tables – Next-level pinball innovation! These modern creations introduce dynamic gameplay mechanics, cutting-edge visuals, and thrilling challenges. These tables can be purchased separately as DLC.

Award Tables – Minimalist pinball tables that you can unlock by completing achievements or by purchasing the Zaccaria Pinball - Achievement Table Pack DLC.

Zombie Invasion – Not your average pinball! Face waves of zombies on a custom-designed table, using thunder strikes, rockets, and powerful attacks to survive. Are you ready for the undead onslaught? (Zaccaria Pinball - Zombie Invasion Mode DLC required for access.)

Graphics Tweaks – Adjust lighting, reflections, glow, particles, motion blur, environment and more to match your style.
Physics Tweaks – Customize flipper strength, ball elasticity, bumper force, velocity, and other physics settings.
Camera Adjustments – Fine-tune camera angles for the perfect pinball perspective.

Zaccaria Pinball - Bronze Pack DLC required for full access.

short_description: Play free and try tables in trial mode with Zaccaria Pinball, featuring 140+ tables, including 40+ officially licensed from Zaccaria was founded by three brothers: Marino, Franco, & Natale. Zaccaria was the world’s 3rd largest pinball manufacturer, next to Bally & Williams. Relive the golden age.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • VR Support: SteamVR

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or SteamOS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
